member.name: M:Nuclex.Audio.Demo.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main entry point of the application
member.param: Command line arguments passed to the application

member.name: M:Nuclex.Audio.Demo.Program.upgradeProtocolLevel(Nuclex.Audio.Metadata.CddbConnection)
member.summary: Upgrades the CDDB protocol to the best level we can use
member.param: Connection whose protocol level will be upgraded

member.name: M:Nuclex.Audio.Demo.Program.listCategories(Nuclex.Audio.Metadata.CddbConnection)
member.summary: Lists the musical categories that are known to the CDDB server
member.param: CDDB server connection that will be queried

member.name: M:Nuclex.Audio.Demo.Program.queryExampleAlbum(Nuclex.Audio.Metadata.CddbConnection)
member.summary: Queries the server for an example album
member.param: Connection through which the query will take place

member.name: M:Nuclex.Audio.Demo.Program.readExampleAlbum(Nuclex.Audio.Metadata.CddbConnection,Nuclex.Audio.Metadata.Cddb.Disc)
member.summary: Reads the XMCD database entry for an example album from the server

Disc informations of the example album
